#summary Donate money to the contributors.

The application is free and open-source and will stay that way.

We don't work on this application for money.

Still, we accept your donations if you want to help us pay our bus tickets ;)

You can donate by buying [https://market.android.com/details?id=org.montrealtransit.android.donate.mm.onetrip the donate app] on the Android Market or using the PayPal donation included in the app.
